person.persName: John M. Ball (Nicholas Co, KY, farmer)

body.p: Nicholas Co, KY, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Rebecca W. Collins in Nicholas County on August 4, 1856. Father of Lemira Ball and Nancy E. Ball. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Nicholas County in 1860.
